sourcesContent:
// About Us page explaining the purpose and rules of the app function About() { return (



About Us

{/* App description */}

Snowboarding Betting is a fake platform built to simulate competitive snowboarding wagers using skill-based odds. Our mission is to provide an engaging experience for winter sports fans who want to test their prediction skills in a fun, creative, and completely risk-free environment.

All betting activities on this platform are purely fictional and intended for entertainment and educational purposes only. No real money is used, processed, stored, or exchanged at any point. This application does not promote, support, or enable real-world gambling of any kind.

Snowboarding Betting is an independent project and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to any professional snowboarding organizations, athletes, events, or leagues. Any names, odds, scores, or outcomes displayed are simulated and do not reflect real-world competitions.

Users are responsible for their own actions while using this website. Any attempt to exploit, manipulate, hack, or alter the system in unintended ways is strictly prohibited. Such actions may result in restricted access or further consequences where applicable.

We respect all individuals and communities. This platform does not mock, target, or discriminate against any religion, culture, ethnicity, background, or personal identity. Content is designed to be inclusive, respectful, and focused purely on gameplay and simulation.

Underage gambling is not supported. Since this platform does not involve real money, it exists solely as a simulated experience. Users are encouraged to enjoy the platform responsibly and understand the difference between fictional gameplay and real-world gambling.

By using Snowboarding Betting, you acknowledge that this is a fictional system created for learning, experimentation, and entertainment. Strap in, ride the odds, and enjoy the experience responsibly.

) } export default About
